Author: mithro_
Content: @Tisham Dhar (CSIRO EASI) - Do you have a link to the DMA game hacking cards?

Author: mithro_
Content: I also have a box of about 30 x CH347 UARTs here.

Author: tishamdhar
Content: I bought an unbranded hardware on Amazon

Author: tishamdhar
Content: I will take a few and develop a recipe with Raspberry Pi 5 and NeTV2 then you can use that stack to wire up all the boards.

Author: mithro_
Content: No DDR memory on that board?

Author: mithro_
Content: Guess if you have a decent PCIe link going, you can just use the host's memory....

Author: tishamdhar
Content: It is a super simple card ch347, FPGA, spi flash and ftdi for output if things back to host. It captures game frames and does stuff automatically (target lock for FPS(.

Author: in1pe
Content: For what they're meant for x4 is already pretty good

Author: in1pe
Content: Though I think they generally use USB / Eth to exfiltrate the data

Author: in1pe
Content: Anticheats will prematurely blacklist drivers and prevent the pages from getting mmio mapped if it looks off
